admission_text:
### Become a Member

Our Members provide vital support to Museum of Contemporary Art_Toronto_Canada’s ambitious activities, including our exhibition, publication, and educational programs dedicated to the most relevant contemporary art from home and abroad.

As a Member, you gain ‘insider’ access to Toronto’s contemporary art scene through special previews, exhibition tours, artist talks, collection and studio visits, travel opportunities, and much more. You also join the ranks of our highly engaged and enthusiastic membership community. Welcome! 

**Purchase a membership through our[ _secure online membership registration system_](/web/20160501221342/http://mocca.ca/product-category/memberships/) by clicking on a membership level below:**

#### $40 Individual / Artist Member

  * Invitation to members-only programming
  * Members-only emails with advance notice of exhibitions, events, and special opportunities
  * Up to 20% off allMuseum of Contemporary Art_Toronto_Canada publications
  * Reciprocal admission to the National Gallery of Canada
  * Reciprocal admission through the OAAG Program

[Purchase Membership ](/web/20160501221342/http://mocca.ca/product/individual-artist-member/)

__ Back to Top 

#### $100 Household Member

**_Includes Individual / Artist Member Benefits PLUS:_**

  * Access for two adults & children under 18 at the same address
  * Reciprocal admission through the NARM Program

[Purchase Membership ](/web/20160501221342/http://mocca.ca/product/househo...

### 

Become a Member!

### 

Members invest in the culture of our times. Join today to support leading-edge contemporary art and gain ‘insider’ access to Toronto’s dynamic art scene.

[ Sign Up Today! ](/web/20160505195521/http://mocca.ca/join-support/)

### There’s a call for a new type of museum. One that’s open to wider demographic and socio-political environments. One that embodies diversity, cultural crossbreeding, new technologies, and the disappearance of silos in artistic disciplines. 

This is tomorrow’s museum. This is our new museum.  
The Museum of Contemporary Art_Toronto_Canada opens on May 2, 2017.  

Contact Us

Museum of Contemporary Art_Toronto_Canada  
New facility opens May 2017  
Toronto, ON | 1.416.395.0067 [info@museumofcontemporaryart.ca](http://web.archive.org/web/20160505195521/mailto:info@museumofcontemporaryart.ca)
